(I'm not going have Megatron and the others destroy the base. I'm going to 
let them storm in and take Rampage's soldiers as prisoners until they pledge 
an allegiance to him.)

Megatron:





Megatron growled. "The base is now obsolete. Our goal now is to take control 
of Hell Beast's ship and reprogram the others if possible. Rampage is 
currently in command. But that will not last long, no." He turned his head. 
"I want Dark Mouse and Quickstrike to sneak inside through the hatch and see 
if you two can disable the computer and bring back the files from the 
Darkside that Quickstrike put there earlier. I shall enter after you disable 
the shields. I doubt Rampage will allow us open armed."
